author: Filmento
description:
Start speaking a new language in 3 weeks with Babbel 🎉. Get up to 55% OFF your subscription here: https://bit.ly/FilmentoNov

Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets is a 2017 sci-fi blockbuster made outside of the Hollywood studio system. And you probably don't know/remember because, despite it being made to launch a franchise, it flopped badly and nobody cared. Even though it has a lot of promise. So let's see how the movie could show promise but still make nobody care.

title: Valerian – The Biggest Sci-Fi Flop You Never Heard of | Anatomy of a Failure
